MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA13 postcode area of Kilwinning. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an shutdown at 11:50am to safely complete repairs works on our underground cable network located on Dalry Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:24am on Thursday, 10 December 2020
